channel.title: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?"

item.title: Re: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded:
Problem is that, as you advance in seasons, the number of required answers goes up.

When you get to needing all 10 of the answers to be correct, Billy becomes the best.

Billy will always tell you the wrong answer, so he narrows it down to 3 possible choices for each question. And since, on average, he gets caught 2 times per test, you can narrow down all the questions this way.

After the first time through the exam, all questions will be reduced to, at most, 2 possible correct answers. Second time through the exam, you either get the right answer, or know what the right answer is, so the third time through, you're guaranteed to pass, assuming you've been keeping track of the right answers.

item.title: Re: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded: I found Pinky alright.I got in with one try,with about 5 answers right

item.title: Re: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded: I agree. To finish in the fewest tries possible, billy is undoubtedly the best. You can discern, with 100% certainty, all of the correct answers in 2 tests, and then pass on the third.

item.title: Re: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded: Consider that Billy will ALWAYS give you the wrong answer, whereas Stalkergirl has a 10% chance per cheat to be wrong. In one test, Billy eliminates half the wrong answers at the very least. This allows to grind the exam in at most 3 tries (pass on the third).

item.title: Re: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded: The answers are different for every player, and switch each Season. ie. You've gotta figure it out every time.

item.title: Re: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded: Don't choose Billy. I was fooled by his looks. Anyhow, I can pm you the answers if you want.

item.title: Re: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded: you actually get expelled 3 times: the last time you get caught cheating, you don't get to see what she wrote. (1~4, KICK, 5~8, KICK, 9-10, FAIL, PASS (4th time = victoly)

item.title: Re: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded: I would say Stalkergirl. While you have an auto fail in avoid getting caught, you get correct answer 90% of the times. You can comlete the exam on 3 tries (2 times you get expelled for cheating, 3rd or time you know the answers)

item.title: Who Is the Best Chunnin Exam Partner?
item.content:encoded: just curious i have a hard time deciding
